title: Active Rust Projects on GitHub Trending Today
body: The GitHub trending page for Rust reveals a variety of actively developed projects that showcase the ecosystem's growth. Notable projects include librespot-org's open-source Spotify client library, YaLTeR's scrollable-tiling Wayland compositor, and zama-ai's FHEVM framework for blockchain applications with Fully Homomorphic Encryption. These projects highlight the diverse applications of Rust, indicating a vibrant and expanding community.
